panels.description: The average number of overall transactions per second
panels.title: Average TPS

panels.description: The max number of overall transactions per second
panels.title: Max TPS

panels.description: The average number of consensus submit message transactions per second
panels.title: HCS TPS

panels.description: The transactions per second broken down by type
panels.title: Transaction Rate

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer polls cloud storage for record files
panels.title: Record List Rate

panels.description: How long it took to search for new record files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (action) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (action)

panels.title: Record Download Latency

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer downloads record file signatures from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Record Signature Rate

panels.description: How long it took to download the record signature file from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Record Signature Latency

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer downloads record files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Record File Rate

panels.description: How long it took to download record files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Record File Latency

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.description: The average record signature file size

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Signature File Size

panels.description: The average file size of the record list response from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="list", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD", action="list", status=~"^2.*"}[$interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Record List Size

panels.description: The duration in seconds it took to verify consensus and hash chain of a stream file

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_stream_verification_seconds_sum{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD"}[$interval])) by (success) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_stream_verification_seconds_count{application="$application", pod="$pod", type="RECORD"}[$interval])) by (success)

panels.title: Record File Verification Latency

panels.description: The difference between the consensus time of the last and first transaction in the stream file
panels.title: Record File Close Interval
